AND "REGDATE" BETWEEN TO_DATE(#{FROM_DATE, jdbcType=VARCHAR},'YYYY.MM.DD hh24:mi:ss') AND TO_DATE(#{TO_DATE, jdbcType=VARCHAR},'YYYY.MM.DD hh24:mi:ss')

SELECT * FROM( SELECT 1 AS "COL", COUNT("CUID") AS "READ_CNT", "READDATE" AS "READ_DATE" FROM t_push_success WHERE "STATUS" = 3 AND "READDATE" IS NOT NULL AND "SEQNO" = #{SEQNO} GROUP BY "CUID", "READDATE" ) A INNER JOIN( SELECT 1 AS "COL", COUNT("CUID") AS "RECV_CNT", "REVDATE" AS "RECV_DATE" FROM t_push_success WHERE "STATUS" = 2 AND "READDATE" IS NOT NULL AND "SEQNO" = #{SEQNO} GROUP BY "CUID", "REVDATE" ) AS B ON A."COL" = B."COL"

SELECT COUNT(*) AS "RECV_CNT", TO_CHAR("REVDATE",'hh24') AS "RECV_DATE" FROM t_push_success WHERE "STATUS" = 2 AND "REVDATE" IS NOT NULL AND "SEQNO" = #{SEQNO} AND TO_CHAR("REVDATE", 'YYYY.MM.DD') = #{DATE} GROUP BY TO_CHAR("REVDATE",'hh24')

SELECT COUNT(*) AS "READ_CNT", TO_CHAR("READDATE",'hh24') AS "READ_DATE" FROM t_push_success WHERE "STATUS" = 3 AND "READDATE" IS NOT NULL AND "SEQNO" = #{SEQNO} AND TO_CHAR("READDATE", 'YYYY.MM.DD') = #{DATE} GROUP BY TO_CHAR("READDATE",'hh24')
